attributes.action: allow places of worship to be charged as  bussinesses and not as a charities this counters the existing  petition to the goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this will allow water companies to recoup their costs and thus not fall on the wider community.ie all our water rates will increase if this does not go ahead.c.e. has 5 billion in assets and millions in cash (google their accounts)why should our children's changing room huts be water rated and not churches/mosques/synagogues?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
